findings.message: The default routing chooses checklist-only flow (option A), but the trigger requires prompting staff immediately after shift close. Without a guaranteed post-close prompt or enforced redirect, the stated outcome can be missed.

The proposed persistence path (addCashCount openingFloat) is append-only (push in current mutation hook), which does not enforce the one opening-float entry per day assumption. Add explicit idempotency/deduping rules if one-per-day is required.
The test command is documented as direct Jest execution; clarify this is CI/governed reference-only.
Acceptance gate uses full-repo pnpm typecheck && pnpm lint; repo policy prefers package-scoped validation unless explicitly needed.
